remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) > [!NOTE] > 在您使用之前控制項，請考慮使用改用控制。Before you use the control, consider using the control instead. 控制項，.NET Framework 2.0 版中引進，是的後繼者控制項。The control, which was introduced in the .NET Framework version 2.0, is the successor to the control. ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來顯示為資料表中的資料行的資料來源的欄位。Use the control to display the fields of a data source as columns in a table. 每個資料列控制項所代表的資料來源中的記錄。Each row in the control represents a record in the data source. 控制項支援選取項目、 編輯、 刪除、 分頁和排序。The control supports selection, editing, deleting, paging, and sorting. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 不同的資料行類型會決定在控制項中的資料行的行為。Different column types determine the behavior of the columns in the control. 下表列出可用的不同的資料行類型。The following table lists the different column types that can be used. |資料行型別Column Type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||顯示繫結至資料來源中欄位的資料行。Displays a column bound to a field in a data source. 它會在欄位中的每個項目顯示為文字時。It displays each item in the field as text. 這是預設的資料行類型控制項。This is the default column type of the control.| ||顯示資料行中的命令按鈕的每個項目。Displays a command button for each item in the column. 這可讓您建立自訂的按鈕控制項的資料行，例如`Add`或`Remove`按鈕。This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as `Add` or `Remove` buttons.| ||顯示包含資料行中每個項目的編輯命令的資料行。Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| ||顯示資料行中的每個項目的內容，為超連結。Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink. 資料行的內容可以繫結至資料來源或靜態文字中的欄位。The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| ||遵循指定之樣板資料行中顯示每個項目。Displays each item in the column following a specified template. 這可讓您提供的資料行中的自訂控制項。This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| 根據預設，屬性設定為`true`，這會建立資料來源中每個欄位的物件。By default, the property is set to `true`, which creates a object for each field in the data source. 每個欄位則會轉譯為中的資料行順序的每個欄位會出現在資料來源控制項。Each field is then rendered as a column in the control in the order that each field appears in the data source. 您可以手動控制哪些資料行出現在控制項，藉由設定屬性設`false`再列出您想要包含的開頭和結尾之間的資料行和``標記。You can also manually control which columns appear in the control by setting the property to `false` and then listing the columns that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的資料行加入集合的順序列出。The columns specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制中的資料行控制項。This allows you to programmatically control the columns in the control. > [!NOTE] > 資料行中所顯示的順序控制會顯示資料行的順序來集合。The order that the columns are displayed in the control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the collection. 雖然您可以操作，以程式設計方式變更的資料行順序集合，它是清單的所需的顯示順序中的資料行的工作變得更容易。Although you can programmatically change the order of the columns by manipulating the collection, it is easier to list the columns in the desired display order. 明確宣告的資料行可以與自動產生的資料行一起顯示。Explicitly declared columns can be displayed in conjunction with automatically generated columns. 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著會自動產生的資料行。When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的資料行不會新增至集合。Automatically generated columns are not added to the collection. 外觀可自訂控制項，藉由設定不同的組件控制項的樣式屬性。The appearance of the control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style Property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||指定的樣式中替代項目的控制項。Specifies the style for alternating items in the control.| ||指定在正在編輯之項目的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the item being edited in the control.| ||指定 [頁尾] 區段中的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the footer section in the control.| ||指定標頭區段中的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the header section in the control.| ||指定的樣式中的項目控制項。Specifies the style for the items in the control.| ||指定的頁面上選取項目區段的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the page selection section of the control.| ||指定選取的項目中的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the selected item in the control.| FormView 控制項處於唯讀模式時，請定義資料列的內容。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 此範本通常會包含用來顯示現有的資料錄的值。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏頁尾區段的控制項。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||顯示或隱藏的標頭區段控制項。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| 您可以控制的外觀控制項以程式設計方式將屬性加入``和``瀏覽器控制項所呈現的標記。You can control the appearance of the control by programmatically adding attributes to the `` and `` tags rendered by the control on the browser. 屬性可以藉由提供的事件處理常式中的程式碼以程式設計方式加入或事件。Attributes can be programmatically added by providing code in the event handler for the or event. 若要將屬性新增至``標記中，先取得物件，表示中的資料格您想要將屬性新增至控制項。To add an attribute to the `` tag, first get the object that represents the cell in the control you want to add the attribute to. 集合屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式可用來取得想要物件。The collection for the property of the object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired object. 然後您可以使用方法收集物件，以將屬性新增至``標記。You can then use the method of the collection for the object to add attributes to the `` tag. 若要將屬性新增至``標記中，先取得物件，表示中的資料列您想要將屬性新增至控制項。To add an attribute to the `` tag, first get the object that represents the row in the control you want to add the attribute to. 的屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式可用來取得想要物件。The property of the object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired object. 然後您可以使用方法收集物件，以將屬性新增至``標記。You can then use the method of the collection for the object to add attributes to the `` tag. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site remarks.format: ## Remarks 分頁可讓您顯示的內容頁面區段中的控制項。Paging allows you to display the contents of the control in page segments. 在頁面上的項目數由屬性。The number of items on a page is determined by the property. 如果未不指定任何值，如屬性，會顯示在頁面上的 10 個項目。If no value is specified for the property, the will display 10 items on a page. 一般而言，資料來源，其中包含每個資料列控制項載入每次控制項移到不同的頁面。Normally, a data source that contains every row in the control is loaded every time the control moves to a different page. 這可能會非常大的資料來源時耗用大量資源。This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large. 自訂分頁，可讓您只載入區段顯示在單一頁面所需的資料。Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page. 若要啟用自訂分頁，同時設定並屬性，以`true`。To enable custom paging, set both the and properties to `true`. 接下來，提供程式碼來處理事件。Next, provide code to handle the event. 一般邏輯事件處理常式會先設定至您想要顯示的頁面索引的屬性。The typical logic for the event handler is to first set the property to the index of the page you want to display. > [!NOTE] > 事件處理常式會接收物件做為參數。The event handler receives a object as a parameter. 您可以使用這個參數，來判斷使用者從頁面選取元素的所選頁面的索引屬性控制項。You can use the property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the control. 接下來，建立包含要顯示在單一頁面上，然後使用資料的資料來源方法來將資料繫結控制項。Next, create a data source that contains the data to display on a single page and then use the method to bind the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 因為載入資料的區段時，您必須設定屬性中的項目總數控制項。Because only a segment of the data is loaded, you must set the property to the total number of items in the control. 這可讓控制項來決定顯示在每個項目所需的頁面總數控制項。This allows the control to determine the total number of pages needed to display every item in the control. 這個屬性通常以程式設計方式設定一次中的項目總數控制決定。This property is normally programmatically set once the total number of items in the control is determined. 當使用啟用分頁屬性設定為`false`，則控制項會假設資料來源包含要顯示的所有項目。When paging is enabled with the property is set to `false`, the control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed. 控制項的高度計算顯示根據指定的頁面索引的頁面上項目的索引屬性，並在頁面上，所指定的項目數屬性。The control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the property, and the number of items on a page, specified by the property. 當屬性設定為`true`，則控制項會假設資料來源只包含的項目由屬性。When the property is set to `true`, the control assumes that the data source only contains the items as determined by the property. 最多的項目所指定數目的所有項目屬性會顯示。All items up to the number of items specified by the property are displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，來啟用自訂分頁。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable custom paging. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridCustomPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCustomPaging/CS/datagridcustompagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridCustomPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCustomPaging/VB/datagridcustompagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分頁可讓您顯示的內容頁面區段中的控制項。Paging allows you to display the contents of the control in page segments. 在頁面上的項目數由屬性。The number of items on a page is determined by the property. 如果未不指定任何值，如屬性，控制項將會顯示在頁面上的 10 個項目。If no value is specified for the property, the control will display 10 items on a page. 根據預設，會停用分頁。By default, paging is disabled. 若要啟用分頁，請將此屬性設定為`true`，並提供程式碼來處理事件。To enable paging, set this property to `true` and provide code to handle the event. 一般邏輯事件是要設定屬性，以您想要顯示，然後使用頁面的索引方法來將資料繫結控制項。The typical logic for the event is to set the property to the index of the page you want to display and then use the method to bind the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 事件處理常式會接收物件做為參數。The event handler receives a object as a parameter. 您可以使用這個參數，來判斷使用者從頁面選取元素的所選頁面的索引屬性控制項。You can use the property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the control. 使用標準的分頁，控制項會假設資料來源包含要顯示的所有項目。With standard paging, the control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed. 控制項的高度計算顯示根據指定的頁面索引的頁面上項目的索引屬性，並在頁面上，所指定項目的項目數目屬性。The control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the property, and the number of items of items on a page, specified by the property. 一般而言，資料來源，其中包含要顯示的所有項目會載入每次在分頁控制項。Normally, a data source that contains all items to be displayed is loaded every time the control is paged. 這可能會非常大的資料來源時耗用大量資源。This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large. 自訂分頁，可讓您只載入區段顯示在單一頁面所需的資料。Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page. 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For additional information on custom paging, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用分頁功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable paging. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.AllowPaging Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AllowPaging Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.AllowPaging Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AllowPaging Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用排序時，控制項呈現在標題區段的每個資料行其中屬性設定。When sorting is enabled, controls are rendered in the heading section of each column where the property is set. 這些控制項可讓您排序所選取的資料行的控制項。These controls allow you to sort the control by the selected column. 唯一的例外是當您使用資料行類型與屬性集。The only exception is when you use a column type with the property set. 在此情況下，您必須提供控制在的資料行。In this case, you must provide a control in the of the column. 時，會引發事件的按一下控制項時。The event is raised when one of the controls is clicked. 它可以決定要提供的事件處理常式的程式碼。It is up to you to provide code for the event handler. 處理常式的一般邏輯是排序清單，並接著重新繫結至資料控制項。The typical logic for the handler is to sort the list, and then rebind the data to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以啟用排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable sorting. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.AllowSorting Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AllowSorting Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.AllowSorting Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AllowSorting Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowSorting/CS/datagridallowsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowSorting/VB/datagridallowsortingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的屬性，以提供自訂的樣式替代項目控制項。Use the property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式替代項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定不同的背景色彩中替代項目的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAlternatingItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAlternatingItemStyle/CS/datagridalternatingitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAlternatingItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAlternatingItemStyle/VB/datagridalternatingitemstylevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemStyle/CS/datagriditemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemStyle/VB/datagriditemstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性會自動建立資料來源中每個欄位的物件。Use this property to automatically create a object for each field in the data source. 每個欄位則會轉譯為中的資料行控制項中的欄位會出現在資料來源中的順序。Each field is then rendered as a column in the control in the order that the fields appear in the data source. 並非所有的資料型別可以繫結至控制項。Not all data types can be bound to the control. 如果欄位包含不支援的資料型別，該欄位將不會建立資料行。If a field contains an unsupported data type, a column is not created for that field. 如果資料來源只包含一個資料行具有不支援的資料型別，則會擲回例外狀況。If the data source only contains one column with an unsupported data type, an exception is thrown. 下表顯示可以繫結至控制項的資料類型。The following table shows the data types that can be bound to the control. |資料類型Data Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |基本Primitives|基本資料類型，例如， ， ，依此類推。A primitive data type, such as , , , and so on. 如需完整的清單，請參閱。For a complete list, see .| |StringString| 物件。A object.| |DateTimeDateTime| 物件。A object.| |DecimalDecimal| 物件。A object.| > [!NOTE] > 可能自動產生的資料行搭配使用明確宣告的資料行。Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with auto-generated columns. 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著自動產生的資料行。When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the auto-generated columns. 自動產生的資料行不會新增至集合。Auto-generated columns are not added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，會自動建立資料來源中每個欄位的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically create a object for each field in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目） 並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以取消進行中的項目編輯控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to cancel edits made to an item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit2/CS/datagridedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit2/VB/datagridedit2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料行的集合控制項。Use this property to programmatically control the collection of columns in the control. 集合包含明確宣告的資料行取得呈現控制項。The collection contains explicitly declared columns that get rendered in the control. > [!NOTE] > 可能與自動產生的資料行搭配使用明確宣告的資料行。Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with automatically generated columns. 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著會自動產生的資料行。When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns. 自動產生的資料行不會新增至集合。Automatically generated columns are not added to the collection. 資料行中所顯示的順序控制會顯示資料行的順序來集合。The order that the columns are displayed in the control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the collection. 下表顯示不同的資料行類別衍生自類別，並可用於集合。The following table shows the different column classes that derive from the class and can be used in the collection. |資料行類型Column type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||顯示繫結至資料來源中欄位的資料行。Displays a column bound to a field in a data source. 它會在欄位中的每個項目顯示為文字時。It displays each item in the field as text. 這是預設的資料行類型控制項。This is the default column type of the control.| ||顯示資料行中的命令按鈕的每個項目。Displays a command button for each item in the column. 這可讓您建立自訂的按鈕控制項的資料行，例如`Add`或`Remove` 按鈕。This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the `Add` or `Remove` button.| ||顯示包含資料行中每個項目的編輯命令的資料行。Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| ||顯示資料行中的每個項目的內容，為超連結。Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink. 資料行的內容可以繫結至資料來源或靜態文字中的欄位。The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| ||遵循指定之樣板資料行中顯示每個項目。Displays each item in the column following a specified template. 這可讓您提供的資料行中的自訂控制項。This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以透過程式設計方式新增的資料行集合中，很容易以靜態方式列出的資料行，然後使用屬性來顯示或隱藏資料行。Although you can programmatically add columns to the collection, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to show or hide the column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以動態方式加入的資料行的集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to dynamically add a column to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.Columns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.Columns Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.Columns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.Columns Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnVisible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnVisible/CS/datagridcolumnvisiblecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnVisible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnVisible/VB/datagridcolumnvisiblevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目按一下 [編輯] 按鈕時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when the Edit button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性，以選取的資料列，然後重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以編輯中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to edit an item in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性時控制項包含決定中選取之項目的索引若要編輯的控制項。Use the property when the control contains an to determine the index of the item selected in the control to edit. 這個屬性也會以程式設計方式控制正在編輯的項目。This property is also used to programmatically control which item is being edited. 將此屬性設定為索引中的項目控制項可編輯控制項中的該項目的。Setting this property to an index of an item in the control will enable editing controls for that item in the . > [!NOTE] > 屬性是以零為起始。The property is zero based. 若要取消編輯，以程式設計方式設定此屬性設為-1。To cancel editing, programmatically set this property to -1. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷所選取來編輯中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the item selected for editing in the control. span.span: A object that contains the style properties of the item selected for editing in the control.

value.span: 預設值為空物件。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性設為所選取來編輯中的項目提供的自訂樣式控制項。Use the property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式來編輯所選取的項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性設定為黃色編輯選取之項目的背景色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the background color of the item selected for editing to yellow. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.EditItemStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.EditItemStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.EditItemStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.EditItemStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來提供的自訂樣式的頁尾控制項。Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer of the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 的屬性控制項繼承的樣式設定屬性。The property of the control inherits the style settings of the property. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性，屬性也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, the property will also have a red font. 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property. 您可以藉由設定覆寫繼承的樣式設定屬性。You can override the inherited style settings by setting the property. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 若要指定自訂樣式頁尾區段，將放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設為`true`才能看到這個屬性。The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定頁尾區段的背景色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the background color of the footer section. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic datagrid.footerstyle example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.FooterStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic datagrid.footerstyle example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.FooterStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridFooterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridFooterStyle/CS/datagridfooterstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridFooterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridFooterStyle/VB/datagridfooterstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，以程式設計方式控制中的項目控制項。Use the collection to programmatically control the items in the control. 集合不會提供任何方法來新增或移除集合的項目。The collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection. 不過，您可以控制的項目內容，藉由提供的處理常式事件。However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the event. > [!NOTE] > 只有繫結至資料來源的項目包含在集合。Only items bound to the data source are contained in the collection. 標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號不會包含在集合中。The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合來顯示中的每個項目的內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to display the contents of each item in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性的項目提供的自訂樣式控制項。Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂的項目樣式控制項，放置``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. 您也可以使用中的屬性以提供不同的外觀的替代項目控制項。You can also use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定背景色彩中的項目為黃色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the background color of the items in the to yellow. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.ItemStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.ItemStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.ItemStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.ItemStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemStyle/CS/datagriditemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemStyle/VB/datagriditemstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 中的項目按一下 [取消] 按鈕時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when the Cancel button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目） 並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以取消進行中的項目編輯控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to cancel edits made to an item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit2/CS/datagridedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit2/VB/datagridedit2vb.aspx#1)]

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method. For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 按一下 [更新] 按鈕的項目時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the Update button for an item is clicked. 一般處理常式事件更新的資料集屬性為-1 （若要取消選取項目），並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to -1 (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以更新中的項目值控制項以使用者指定的新值。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to update the values of an item in the control to new values specified by the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性設為選取的項目中提供的自訂樣式控制項。Use the property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式，針對選取的項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定選取的項目中的背景色彩為黃色的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use property to set the background color of the selected item in the control to yellow. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid.SelectedIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.SelectedIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid.SelectedIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid.SelectedIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridSelectedItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridSelectedItemStyle/CS/datagridselecteditemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridSelectedItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridSelectedItemStyle/VB/datagridselecteditemstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下 [更新] 按鈕的項目時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the Update button for an item is clicked. 一般處理常式事件更新的資料集屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目），並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以更新中的項目值控制項以使用者指定的新值。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to update the values of an item in the control to new values specified by the user.
